description: Quotient cycle length in continued fraction expansion of sqrt(2^(2n-1)), i.e., square root of odd power of 2, quadratic surds.
links: K. R. Matthews, On the continued fraction expansion of sqrt(2^(2n+1))
author: _Labos Elemer_, Mar 01 2001
extensions: More terms from Don Reble (djr(AT)nk.ca), Oct 31 2001
a(33), a(34) and a(35) from Keith Matthews (keithmatt(AT)gmail.com), Feb 16 2007, Feb 28 2007
